title: Georgian College - Experience MORE.
text: Get to Know Georgian Thinking about studying at Georgian? Have questions about programs or services? We’re here to help! Attend our Get to Know Georgian virtual info session on Tuesday, March 3 at 5 p.m. Start your journey! Looking to launch your career or change direction? With 130+ programs to choose from, enjoy hands-on learning, gain real-world work experience, appreciate small class sizes – and graduate job-ready! Which career is right for you? Not sure about your next career move? Our career assessment tool will help find the best fit for your personality type and you’ll receive a list of Georgian programs you may be well suited to. Why Georgian College? 90.3%of our graduates find employment within six months of graduation 6,200employers partner with Georgian to offer student work experiences 100%of our programs emphasize practical, hands-on learning 1stGeorgian is the first and only college in Canada designated as an Ashoka Changemaker College Bear Tracks Blog Featured news Latest news - Huntsville Public Library unveils Community Impact Lab in partnership with Georgian College and YMCA Simcoe/Muskoka to spark rural innovation - New $52,000 endowment invests in future automotive leaders at Georgian College - Georgian College joins Canadian Nuclear Association to strengthen Canada’s clean energy workforce - Days of significance: February 2026 - Ways to mark Black History Month - Georgian College receives $1 million from Ontario Research Fund to expand Ontario’s first Industry 5.0 sandbox - People of Georgian: Dwight Lahay on relationships, resilience and kindness
